name: pcpanelpro
description: macOS controller for PC Panel Pro

scripts.build: tsc && npm run build:renderer && mkdir -p dist/main/assets && cp -r src/main/assets/* dist/main/assets/
scripts.build:renderer: esbuild src/renderer/main.tsx --bundle --minify --outfile=dist/renderer/bundle.js --platform=browser --target=es2020 && cp src/renderer/index.html src/renderer/styles.css dist/renderer/
scripts.pack: npm run build && npm run build:driver && npm run build:icon && npm run rebuild && electron-builder --dir
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run build:driver && npm run build:icon && npm run rebuild && electron-builder
